markdownRemark.html:
Recently, I participated in the National Data Science Challenge organized by Shopee!

It was an incredibly inspiring and exhilarating experience as I worked with my team members to create a solution that we could be proud of.

Being able to create a CLI and find ways to analyse large sets of data deepened my experience as a developer and taught me to approach problems in a different ways.

Thank you to Mr Lim, Zheng Guang and Feng Yue for accompanying me on this journey!

frontmatter.title: Concluding the National Data Science Challenge 2019
